Volcanoes are not something to regularly march towards but several UMKC geology students are doing just that. while they are not trekking directly into the volcanos throat these researchers are retracing the path of the lava to see what is left after an eruption... PERIOD

Every year undergraduate research from any field of study contributes to the next volume of Lucerna PERIOD This research ranges from interpretations of literature to statistical analysis. founded in  this studentrun organization has publicized over  undergraduate.. PERIOD
